subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Federer captured his fourth title of the year, and his first in the Shanghai Masters, with a 7-6 (6), 7-6 (2) victory over Gilles Simon in the final on Sunday.
snippet: Federer captured his fourth title of the year, and his first in the Shanghai Masters, with a 7-6 (6), 7-6 (2) victory over Gilles Simon in the final on Sunday.
